name: Emerald Tablet 2
description:
This was my submission to the 2022 Epic Megajam, but unfortunately it looks like my upload was somehow removed. So, this is a a new page for people to try out the game. Leave a nice comment if you like it, and if someone from Epic sees this.. please help ;_;

"You're an alchemist fighting off hoards of homunculus, as you gather alchemy ingredients that together with your knowledge of alchemic symbols will open the gates to the Emerald Tablet."
